primary

Class LCDInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • primary.LCDInfo

  • public class LCDInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Prints the value reported by the odometer on the EV3's LCD screen. Can also be used for debugging by printing all sorts of variables in real time.
    Author:
    Ken
